channel.title: moejoe on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in moejoe on Barefoot Rob

item.title: today
item.description: 20:47 Sunday 06 May 2018 JST Egad I got my credit card bill (yay I have a credit card) and holy shipes I should have been a bit more careful. Gotta sort out $450 by the tenth. I would think I should have this shit figured out by now. In other news, Lin and I walked into one of the unfinished homes near our house. Did not stay too long and did not go to the second floor because there were no stairs installed yet.

item.title: Oh iOS why dost thou vex me so
item.description: 08:50 Monday 17 July 2017 JST I guess it’s because I no longer wish to understand your mysterious ways.

item.title: my teacher is having throat surgery
item.description: 21:45 Sunday 09 July 2017 JST OMG my Japanese teacher has recently been told she has to have something removed from her throat! Thank you for your kindness. I think I'll be OK. But to be honest they'll cut my throat and take something off (sorry!) so I have no idea how long is going to be until I can speak as a language tutor. Hope it's soon though. また たくさん 話しましょうね！ Yikes stripes!

item.title: Mac Cam
item.description: 01:33 Saturday 10 December 2016 JST Boo. My Macbook’s builtin camera isn’t responding. I reset the PRAM by holding Option Command P R on reboot (though maybe that was being short circuited by firmware password). Anyway, boo. 10:33 Sunday 11 December 2016 JST I removed my firmware password and then was able to do the PRAM reset and now the camera works again.

item.title: parse.com is going away
item.description: 22:25 Wednesday 30 November 2016 JST How am I the last one to know this? We have about seven apps using parse as the backend. Today I migrated some of our parse data to mlab.com and was able to set up an elastic beanstalk thing which should hopefully run Parse Server. Still need to sort it out a bit more.

item.title: may have lost my old suica card
item.description: 00:55 Saturday 12 November 2016 JST I took my Suica card out of my wallet this morning and wore it inside my glove while it was raining. I held my umbrella and took the bus to the station with Lin where she took a picture of me barefoot in the rain. Gave her a kiss then walked home and when I went back to the station for work, I noticed my Suica was missing.

item.title: moe joe bah
item.description: 17:46 Thursday 20 October 2016 JST Why the heck can’t I find an Android app that can scp images using ssh keys? There are plenty of ssh apps, but not scp.. VXConnectBot allegedly added scp to ConnectBot, but I don’t see how to get scp to work on it. 20:52 Ah, I found a way to upload files from my phone using VXConnectBot. It’s convoluted, and can only do one at a time, but it’s better than zero.

item.title: Fred's car got towed
item.description: 11:40 Thursday 28 January 2016 CST Three people are in an apartment: Rob (American, slightly unshaven), Fred (younger brother, very unshaven), Lin (attractive asian-looking woman) Rob: Okay guys, let's go skydiving! The trio walk outside into a glorious sun filled afternoon and head to the parking lot. Fred: Dude. Where's my car? Rob: Aw man this ain't cool. Lin: Where did you park it? Fred immediately calls someone on the phone.
